name: Bees in a Trenchcoat
description:
As bees in a trenchcoat, you must not bee seen by anyone while completing puzzles to get to the end of each level!

Controls

WASD - move

Click - interact / use / drag objects

F - place a hive

Spacebar - drop the trenchcoat

We took the theme and used the genres Stealth and Puzzles - and when you are bees, doing anything is a puzzle and staying hidden is a must. Because humans hate bees, but it's ok because we hate them back!
